domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies

text: @NCDCgov This comment section is a mess. We are supposed to be seeing tweets like projections of infection trajectory,  progress on vaccines , trends of the covid19 curves and when we are likely to peak, but here we are with these people with follow back nonsense.. don't y'all get tired
